function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difficulty in obtaining detailed observation data of crowds and resident activity in public health and safety emergencies","Impact":"Inability to accurately monitor and track the spread of contagious diseases, leading to ineffective control measures","Mitigation":"Use of advanced data collection and analysis techniques, establishment of emergency data collection protocols","Technologies":"Data collection sensors, IoT devices, machine learning algorithms","People":"Public health and safety officials, emergency response teams","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Backtracking problem in current epidemic-related data","Impact":"Inability to trace the origin of infections, hindering effective containment strategies","Mitigation":"Implementation of comprehensive contact tracing systems, improvement of data collection methods","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, GPS tracking, data analytics tools","People":"Epidemiologists, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health agencies, technology companies"},{"Description":"Inability to establish observation strategies and scientific methods aligned with reality in public health emergencies","Impact":"Inaccurate modeling and prediction of disease spread, leading to ineffective intervention strategies","Mitigation":"Integration of real-time data sources, validation of models with ground truth data, collaboration with domain experts","Technologies":"Real-time data feeds, GIS mapping, simulation modeling software","People":"Health researchers, public health officials, data scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
